thread.title: Man claims his dog shot sleeping girlfriend | New York Post
thread.title_full: Man claims his dog shot sleeping girlfriend | New York Post

author: Danika Fears
title: Man claims his dog shot sleeping girlfriend | New York Post
text:
This pup’s really in the doghouse now.
A Florida man claims his pooch accidentally shot his sleeping girlfriend in the leg on Tuesday night, according to reports.
Brian Murphy, 25, told police the dog, Diesel, had woken him up, so he let him outside.
When they returned together to the pitch-black bedroom, Diesel “jumped up on the nightstand, where his gun was sitting, and it went off,” Murphy claimed, according to ActionNewsJax. 
Murphy said he saw a flash and then heard a bang.
His girlfriend, Summer Miracle, awoke with a throbbing pain in her right leg. She’d been struck by a bullet but wasn’t sure how, Miracle told police.
Murphy put a towel around his girlfriend’s bleeding leg and called the cops just before 11:30 p.m. The woman was taken to the hospital with non-life-threatening injuries.
